ygData.subject: Re: FV to LOIO and the DL run to FV
ygData.msgSnippet: One caviat to this message--- Some Drachnids can Root you, AND some can cast a poison DOT (others have to hit you to effect the poison DOT). If you are low
ygData.messageBody:
One caviat to this message--- Some Drachnids can
Root you, AND some can cast a poison DOT (others have
to hit you to effect the poison DOT). If you are low
level and either of these things happen, you're in big
trouble.<br><br>That being said-- I'm in your same position-- as a
druid who has made those runs many times. If you can
Lev-- i suggest you do it in DL-- i can get past
Karnors in the air, such that nothing even has a chance
of agroing. Cake-- then you just have to dodge
Drachnids while going through the hills and trees finding
the cave enterence that leads to FV. Again---
remember that once in FV, you have to bypass drachnids to
get to the FV outpost or LOIO. <br><br>OH-- and there
seems to be a lvl 50+ quest mob Necro who rarely roams
around the run from FV outpost to LOIO and can see
invis-- didn't know about him until he killed my rogue
who was doing the run and was in the WRONG place at
the WRONG time. <br><br>X.
